1: Cßajoß li raylal yô chixcßulbal li tenamit Israel chalen chak saß xticlajic. Lâex aj Israel, yehomak nak xecßul li raylal.
2: Chalen nak xticla chak li katenamit, cßajoß nak corahobtesîc xbaneb li xicß nequeßiloc ke, abanan incßaß queßnumta saß kabên.
3: Cßajoß li raylal queßxbânu ke. Nak coeßxqßue chi tzßûm, quijacheß lix yi kix xban li tzßûm. Chanchan nak nequeßxbec li chßochß riqßuin li arado.
4: Abanan li nimajcual Dios, aßan tîc xchßôl. Aßan qui-isin ke rubel xcuanquileb li incßaß useb xnaßleb.
5: Xutânal taxak teßêlk chixjunileb li xicß nequeßiloc re li tenamit Sión. Ut teßsachekß taxak xcuanquileb.
6: Cheßxcßul taxak joß naxcßul li pim li nayoßla saß xbên li cab. Junpât ajcuiß nacuan ut nachakic usta incßaß namichßeß.
7: Chanchanakeb taxak li pim li mâcßaß na-oc cuiß chiru laj acuinel. Mâ ani na-ajoc re xban nak mâcßaß na-oc cuiß.Li ani teßnumekß incßaß teßxtzßâma rusilal li Dios saß xbêneb chi moco teßxtzßâma nak li Dios tâosobtesînk reheb.
